version_description:
What's New in Version 0.5.0 :

Arena Of Death
Welcome to arena where the weak are crushed and strong rule forever.
Kill most zombies in many ways to amuse bloodthirsty audience.
Compete against others. Challe

What´s new in long expected and rich Dead Trigger 2 TOURNAMENT Update:

1) TOURNAMENTS
Become a legend, earn unbelievable prizes and play as for your life.

We've prepared a uniques tournament for every weekend. Show us how good fighter you

0.6.1 update:

Brazilian-Portugues language support : Removed stability issue
Resolved game stability problem when displaying Ads

******
What´s new in long expected and rich Dead Trigger 2 TOURNAMENT Update:

1) TOURNAMENTS
B

Summer Explorer Update

Join the SPECIAL MISSION, travel the world and earn more money than ever before.

BRING IT ON - refreshing summer update in sight. Get global and fight. New city - new mission - new challenge, every day. On top of that

Halloween Birthday Party UPDATE
===================================
Celebrate the First Anniversary of DT2 with an insane Halloween Party, come and unwrap your presents!

Birthday fun
A Halloween surprise from the zombies. Hurry up, you can

The Carnage UPDATE
====
Come and celebrate Carnage on Dead Trigger 2

More revelations in the new story sequel
=====
The search continues, as the trail leads to South America. Uncover the secrets of SUPREME who commands the Black Coats.

Valentine’s Day Heart Attack Update
***Special Valentine's offer - WILD WEST PACK for just 4.99 USD ***

Enjoy a special theme during the Valentine’s Day weekend!

Valentine’s decorations – style changes to the visuals of your favorite game

Easter Carnage Update

Come and celebrate exciting Eastern Carnage of Dead Trigger 2.

Easter gifts & decorations
New tournament tour at China’s Great Wall
Permanent application of all current discounts
Plenty of improvements for

Enjoy Summer Update

- M.A.D. Virus European Tournaments
- New improvements for best performance of all devices
- New rewards system
- Unlocking new regions for tournaments
- Improving message relevancy based on player’s activity

Happy Winter Carnage!
Get into the festive spirit with 2 new signature weapons! Crush zombies with shatterproof baubles shot from the Santa's Ball Launcher, or sweeten up the undead with the Candy Cane! Limited offer: December only!
Discover Kyle's

Thanks for playing Dead Trigger 2. More than 60 million players downloaded this game and thanks to you, we are always working hard to make the game faster and better than ever. Bug fixes and performance improvements in the new version make slaying zombies

Blueprints are now dropping also in Gandhi and Sprinter tournaments
Decreased the amount of intrusive ads, lots of bug fixes and performance improvements to make slaying the zombies even more delightful.

Great news, Players!
DT2 Update 1.5.0 is here
Celebrating 100 million downloads
NEW CONTENT
3 New environments with 25 new gameplay objectives
- Nuclear Plant
- Abandoned Factory
- Farm
2 New Powerful Weapons
- Kriss Vector Elit

GREAT NEWS!!!
Dead Trigger 2 Update 1.5.1 is here.
With lots of awesome improvements and bug fixes.

New Feature:
- Ironsight has been made visible in autofire mode

Fixes:
- All gameplay types are now available in Generic Missi
